channel.title: 4 Problems, Project Insanity
channel.description:
Problem One: When I click an object I get a message in my chatbox that says something like [b]objectId: 1516 objectX: 3217 objectY: 3218[/b]. It's really annoying and I'm wanting to stop it, how do I stop it for all objects?
Problem Two: I've spawned NPC's around my realm, I want some NPCS to just stand still and not move and some to move within specified coordinates like deltascape. How can I do this?
Problem Three: When My NPCS die they die in a weird forum and it's all retarted like, it's not a animation it's my npcs glitching. Same with some NPCs how do I fix this?
Problem Four: How Do I add working dialogues so they work and I can add quests and stuff?

I was close

item.title: 4 Problems, Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

ta1nt3d:

lol you can change #1 all you have to do is // comment out one line lulz

It’s actually 6 lines.

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:5, topic:405706”]Three: NpcHandler.java you will need to have the corrrect animations

then you can look for something like DeathEmote

and under it there will be a lot of cases like

case XXXX:
Return XXXX;

make a new one and make it something like this

Case NPCID:
Return ANIMID;[/quote]
I’ve searched everything in there and I can’t find anything.

Read full topic

item.title: 4 Problems, Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

One: That is only for the owner, it helps with coding.

Two: Go into spawnconfig and you will see something like this

Npc= NPCID COORDSX COORDSY HiEGHT MOVE

change the Move" to 0 is you don’t want them to move at all. Change it to 1 if you want them to move

Three: NpcHandler.java you will need to have the corrrect animations

then you can look for something like DeathEmote

and under it there will be a lot of cases like

case XXXX:
Return XXXX;

make a new one and make it something like this

Case NPCID:
Return ANIMID;

Read full topic

item.title: 4 Problems, Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:2, topic:405706”]1: thats only for owner. just letting you know about the stuff (cannot change i dont think)
2: to change them to stand still do this
yourserver>Data>cfg>spawn-config.cfg
spawn = 3381 3076 3509 0 0 0 0 0 1
^
Make this 0 for them to not walk
and 1 for them to walk around you can change the range in a .cfg file somewhere.
3: try to find the emote for death and put it in the death.txt
4: that would be in your data. make a folder called quests
@yel@ Recipe for Disaster

I need to speak to the Gypsie she will know what
to do next.

@str@ I have gathered all the materials required.
for your first set. for recipe for disaster and just keep going with it
i’m not that familiar with quests.[/quote]

lol you can change #1 all you have to do is // comment out one line lulz

Read full topic

item.title: 4 Problems, Project Insanity

@SacredHeart wrote:

Problem One:
When I click an object I get a message in my chatbox that says something like objectId: 1516 objectX: 3217 objectY: 3218. It’s really annoying and I’m wanting to stop it, how do I stop it for all objects?

Problem Two:
I’ve spawned NPC’s around my realm, I want some NPCS to just stand still and not move and some to move within specified coordinates like deltascape. How can I do this?

Problem Three:
When My NPCS die they die in a weird forum and it’s all retarted like, it’s not a animation it’s my npcs glitching. Same with some NPCs how do I fix this?

Problem Four:
How Do I add working dialogues so they work and I can add quests and stuff?
